pageProduct.name: Vagisil Soothing Oatmeal Cream 15g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Specially formulated for sensitive intimate skin.

Your intimate are is sensitive, so it's important to use products that are gentle and non-irritating. But, if you have sesnitive skin, you need more.

We'll help you find the right product for you:

Vagisil Soothing Oatmeal Cream

Soothes and protects sensitive intimate skin. Vagisil Soothing Oatmeal Cream is specifically formulated for sensitive intimate skin.

Vagisil Sensitive Intimate Wash

Get all-day freshness without irritation. Vagisil Sensitive Intimate Wash is especially designed for the unique needs of sensitive intimate skin. Gentle enough for daily use.

General Information

Vagisil Soothing Oatmeal Cream soothes & protects sensitive intimate skin.


Vagisil Soothing Oatmeal Cream is specifically formulated for sensitive intiamte skin.
Provides a fast soothing sensation, with a gentle moisturising formula that can be used daily.
Fragrance & colourant free.
Gynaecologist tested.

Size: 15g

KEY FEATURES

• Soothes & protects sensitive intimate skin.
• Moisturising formula with soothing oatmeal.
• Gentle for daily use.
• Ideal for sensitive skin.
• Fragrance & colourant free.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse eyes with water. Keep out of reach of children

Ingredients

Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Colloidal Oatmeal, Stearic Acid, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Distearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Glycerin, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hydroxide, Lactic Acid

Directions

Apply to the affected external vaginal area.
